description: New Version: Includes new audio! Available in English.  Now get in the face of those who annoy you!  Sgt Hartman from Full Metal Jacket comes to your rescue with this soundboard featuring five key phrases such as "I do not like you", "Well you little maggot, you make me want to vomit", "Thank you very much, can I be in charge for a while?", "You're so ugly you could be a modern art masterpiece", and more!   All this on top of a picture of Sgt Hartman getting in your face.  Never be at a loss for words again!
